Function Documentation

int rbxUsbor_getNexusConnection (  int  usborHandle,
int *  nexusHandle
) 
 

Gets a handle to the Usbor's parent NexusConnection.

Parameters:
[in] usborHandle a handle to the Usbor
[out] nexusHandle pointer to an int that receives the handle of the parent NexusConnection
Returns:
RBX_E_USBOR_HANDLE_INVALID if the specified Usbor handle is invalid
generic Robix Error Codes

int rbxUsbor_getName (  int  usborHandle,
char *  usborName,
int  maxLen,
int *  retLen
) 
 

Gets an Usbor's name.

Parameters:
[in] usborHandle a handle to the Usbor
[out] usborName pointer to a user buffer that receives the string; or NULL to get the required buffer length
[in] maxLen length of user buffer
[out] retLen pointer to an int that receives the actual number of characters copied or the required buffer length (if user buffer is NULL);
this paramater can be NULL only if the user buffer is not NULL;
Returns:
RBX_E_USBOR_HANDLE_INVALID if the specified Usbor handle is invalid
generic Robix Error Codes
See also:
Fetching Strings

int rbxUsbor_getPropertyHeartbeatInterval (  int  usborHandle,
int *  intervalMs
) 
 

Gets an Usbor's property heartbeat interval.

Property heartbeat messages contain any pod properties, servo properties, and digout values that have changed since the last property heartbeat was sent.

Parameters:
[in] usborHandle a handle to the Usbor
[out] intervalMs pointer to an int that receives the property heartbeat interval
Returns:
RBX_E_USBOR_HANDLE_INVALID if the specified Usbor handle is invalid
generic Robix Error Codes
See also:
rbxPod_getPropertyHeartbeatTick()

int rbxUsbor_getSensorHeartbeatInterval (  int  usborHandle,
int *  intervalMs
) 
 

Gets an Usbor's sensor heartbeat interval.

Sensor heartbeat messages contain any sensor values that have changed since the last sensor heartbeat was sent.

Parameters:
[in] usborHandle a handle to the Usbor
[out] intervalMs pointer to an int that receives the sensor heartbeat interval
Returns:
RBX_E_USBOR_HANDLE_INVALID if the specified Usbor handle is invalid
generic Robix Error Codes
See also:
rbxPod_getSensorHeartbeatTick()

int rbxUsbor_getPodCount (  int  usborHandle,
int *  count
) 
 

Gets the number of Pods contained in the Usbor.

Parameters:
[in] usborHandle a handle to the Usbor
[out] count pointer to an int that receives the pod count
Returns:
RBX_E_USBOR_HANDLE_INVALID if the specified Usbor handle is invalid
generic Robix Error Codes

int rbxUsbor_getPod (  int  usborHandle,
int  podId,
int *  podHandle
) 
 

Gets a handle to the specified Pod.

Parameters:
[in] usborHandle a handle to the Usbor
[in] podId the pod's ID (one-based)
[out] podHandle pointer to an int that receives the pod handle
Returns:
RBX_E_POD_ID_INVALID if podId < 1 or podId > rbxUsbor_getPodCount()
RBX_E_USBOR_HANDLE_INVALID if the specified Usbor handle is invalid
generic Robix Error Codes

int rbxUsbor_getRepName (  int  usborHandle,
char *  repName,
int  maxLen,
int *  retLen
) 
 

Gets the name of the peer object (the Rep) to which an Usbor object is connected.

[in] maxLen length of user buffer
[out] retLen pointer to an int that receives the actual number of characters copied or the required buffer length (if user buffer is NULL);
this paramater can be NULL only if the user buffer is not NULL;
Returns:
RBX_E_USBOR_HANDLE_INVALID if the specified Usbor handle is invalid
generic Robix Error Codes
See also:

int rbxUsbor_getRepLocation (  int  usborHandle,
char *  repLoc,
int  maxLen,
int *  retLen
) 
 

Gets the location of the Usbor's peer.

e.g. "127.0.0.1"

Parameters:
[in] usborHandle a handle to the Usbor
[out] repLoc pointer to a user buffer that receives the string; or NULL to get the required buffer length
[in] maxLen length of user buffer
[out] retLen pointer to an int that receives the actual number of characters copied or the required buffer length (if user buffer is NULL);
this paramater can be NULL only if the user buffer is not NULL;
Returns:
RBX_E_USBOR_HANDLE_INVALID if the specified Usbor handle is invalid
generic Robix Error Codes
See also:
Fetching Strings

int rbxUsbor_getRepResponseTimeMs (  int  usborHandle,
int *  timeMs
) 
 

Gets the average reponse time (aka ping time) of the Usbor's peer.

This is the amount of time it takes a message to make a round trip, to the peer and back again.

Parameters:
[in] usborHandle a handle to the Usbor
[out] timeMs pointer to an int that receives the average response time (in milliseconds)
Returns:
RBX_E_USBOR_HANDLE_INVALID if the specified Usbor handle is invalid
generic Robix Error Codes
